title: Tornado Allie
description: A grieving daughter follows in the footsteps of her storm-chasing father in Rierden’s fiction debut.A fast-paced young adult adventure set in the world of extreme meteorology, the story opens in the midst of a ragingtornado. Two of the world’s foremost experts on weather formation are tracking the storm as it rages across the plains.When the storm alters course unexpectedly, Dave McShaw is sucked into the funnel cloud and killed. At home, hisfamily is devastated. Dave’s 16-year-old daughter, Allie, is especially distraught. She has long loved meteorology andworshiped her father as both a parent and a hero. When her father’s partner offers her a unique opportunity to carry onher father’s work, Allie jumps at the chance. She becomes a storm chaser herself and must juggle the demands of herhigh school life with the intensity of tracking deadly weather systems. Rierden establishes an intriguing premise thatincorporates the melodrama and minutia of teenagers with the outsized adventure that makes for a good story. Plus, Allieis an appealing protagonist and provides a too rare portrait of a young woman succeeding in the sciences.
author: Tim Rierden
